item.value:
/** * Initiates an orderly shutdown in which previously submitted * tasks are executed, but no new tasks will be accepted. * Invocation has no additional effect if already shut down. * *

This method does not wait for previously submitted tasks to * complete execution. Use {@link #awaitTermination awaitTermination} * to do that. * * @throws SecurityException if a security manager exists and * shutting down this ExecutorService may manipulate * threads that the caller is not permitted to modify * because it does not hold {@link * java.lang.RuntimePermission}{@code ("modifyThread")}, * or the security manager's {@code checkAccess} method * denies access. */
/** * Specify if the condition should match if the property is not set. Defaults to * {@code false}. * @return if should match if the property is missing */
